lines.text: I shot him, I think, I think he's dead.
You think?
Yeah, I think.
Hey, everybody! Milo thinks!
To hell with this!

[Kay and his gang are trying to rape Thora, but Joe comes along]
I would hate to interrupt, but I believe a little foreplay would get you boys a better response.
Who the hell are you?
Joe Brody.
Well, Mr. Joe Brody, this ain't none of your business. Somebody get this idiot out of my face.
It's okay, you can relax, Lester, we just drop by to try one of your famous steak dinners.
Hmm, we're fresh out of meat.
Come on, baby, shoot me. You can do it, I know that you can.

[to Thora]
Do as the man says.
You better do it because I'm not gonna forget your face.
Shoot him.
[Thors hesitates and lowers the gun]
Don't press your luck, pal.
You should've killed me, honey 'cause now I'm gonna have to plague your sweet ass.
Would you like a shower?
You mean like a water shower, huh?
Of course, how else could you wash?
Hey, get off, and don't play with a man's bike without asking first.
I wasn't really playing. I was just...
Yeah, right.

[about Brody]
He's one tough bastard, Kay.
How is it going, soldier?
I got a couple of questions, chief. I wanna know why I wasn't told there were civilized people on Earth? And why you don't want them to activate "The Amarant"?
There're simply things you do not understand.
You were gonna kill all those people, weren't you, chief? Men, women, children, everyone, weren't you? Tell me the truth, chief, please, were you gonna kill all those people?
It's a better way to start over, build a new society, don't make the mistakes mankind made in the past. Think of it, Joe, imagine the possibility...
Imagine this!
[Shoots the monophone]
You feel better now?
I want you to explain to me again. How could you run from an asshole like that piece of shit?
I ran for help.
I think that you ran because you're a whimpering piece of radioactive waste that's even afraid of his own MAMA. I'M SURROUNDED WITH GODDAMN IDIOTS AND MAGGOTS.
You're not gonna let that girl get away with that crap, now are ya?

Nobody won't get away with NOTHING. I had a vision last night about that sweet bitch's future. It was short and very, very painful. Now I want you to get some of the boys to ride over to their camp, and you can shoot up the place a little bit. You can raise hell, you can have all fun you want, but you're gonna bring that bitch back to me. You understand?
Yeah, okay.
And if you don't...
[Takes off a switchblade]
...then I'm gonna have to give you something that you ain't gonna be able to run from.
